trans-unit.source: Public title for the product's page, and for search engines. Leave blank to use the product name. The number of remaining characters is displayed to the left of the field.
trans-unit.target: Public title for the product page and for search engines. Leave blank to use the product name. The number of remaining characters is displayed to the left of the field.

trans-unit.source: This description will appear in search engines. You need a single sentence, shorter than 160 characters (including spaces)
trans-unit.target: This description will appear in search engines. You need a single sentence, shorter than 160 characters (including spaces)

trans-unit.source: Search for a product
trans-unit.target: Search for a product

trans-unit.source:
The summary is a short sentence describing your product.
It will appears at the top of your shop's product page, in product lists, and in search engines' results page (so it's important for SEO). To give more details about your product, use the "Description" tab.
trans-unit.target: Fill in a striking short description of the product (displayed on product page and product list as abstract for customers and search engines). For detailed informations use the 'description tab.'

trans-unit.source: Use a comma to create seperate tags. E.g.: dress, cotton, party dresses.
trans-unit.target: Use a comma to create seperate tags. E.g.: dress, cotton, party dresses.

trans-unit.source: Your internal name for this attribute.
trans-unit.target: Your internal name for this attribute.

trans-unit.source: The public name for this attribute, displayed to the customers.
trans-unit.target: The public name for this attribute, displayed to the customers.

trans-unit.source: The way the attribute's values will be presented to the customers in the product's page.
trans-unit.target: The way the attribute's values will be presented to the customers in the product's page.

trans-unit.source: Choose the attribute group for this value.
trans-unit.target: Choose the attribute group for this value.

trans-unit.source: Choose a color with the color picker, or enter an HTML color (e.g. "lightblue", "#CC6600").
trans-unit.target: Choose a color with the color picker, or enter an HTML color (e.g. "lightblue", "#CC6600").

trans-unit.source: Upload an image file containing the color texture from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Upload an image file containing the color texture from your computer.

trans-unit.source: This will override the HTML color!
trans-unit.target: This will override the HTML color!

trans-unit.source: Save then add another value
trans-unit.target: Save then add another value

trans-unit.source: Only letters and the minus (-) character are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Only letters and the minus (-) character are allowed.

trans-unit.source: Add new feature value
trans-unit.target: Add new feature value

trans-unit.source: Save and add another value
trans-unit.target: Save and add another value

trans-unit.source: Back to the list
trans-unit.target: Back to the list

trans-unit.source: Add new feature values
trans-unit.target: Add new feature values

trans-unit.target: Company name for this supplier

trans-unit.target: Will appear in the list of suppliers.

trans-unit.target: Phone number for this supplier

trans-unit.target: Mobile phone number for this supplier.

trans-unit.source: Upload a supplier logo from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Upload a supplier logo from your computer.

trans-unit.source: To add "tags" click in the field, write something and then press "Enter".
trans-unit.target: To add "tags" click in the field, write something and then press "Enter".

trans-unit.source: Upload a brand logo from your computer.
trans-unit.target: Upload a brand logo from your computer.

trans-unit.source: To add "tags," click inside the field, write something, and then press "Enter."
trans-unit.target: To add "tags," click inside the field, write something, and then press "Enter."

trans-unit.source: Allow customers to upload files using the contact page.
trans-unit.target: Allow customers to upload files using the contact page.

trans-unit.source: Please fill out the message fields that appear by default when you answer a thread on the customer service page.
trans-unit.target: Please fill out the message fields that appear by default when you answer a thread on the customer service page.

trans-unit.source: URL for your IMAP server (ie.: mail.server.com).
trans-unit.target: URL for your IMAP server (ie.: mail.server.com).

trans-unit.source: Port to use to connect to your IMAP server.
trans-unit.target: Port to use to connect to your IMAP server.

trans-unit.source: User to use to connect to your IMAP server.
trans-unit.target: User to use to connect to your IMAP server.

trans-unit.source: Password to use to connect your IMAP server.
trans-unit.target: Password to use to connect your IMAP server.

trans-unit.source: Delete messages after synchronization. If you do not enable this option, the synchronization will take more time.
trans-unit.target: Delete messages after synchronization. If you do not enable this option, the synchronization will take more time.

trans-unit.source: Create new threads for unrecognized emails.
trans-unit.target: Create new threads for unrecognized emails.

trans-unit.source: Do not use RSH or SSH to establish a preauthenticated IMAP sessions.
trans-unit.target: Do not use RSH or SSH to establish a preauthenticated IMAP sessions.

trans-unit.source: Use the Secure Socket Layer (TLS/SSL) to encrypt the session.
trans-unit.target: Use the Secure Socket Layer (TLS/SSL) to encrypt the session.

trans-unit.source: Validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server.
trans-unit.target: Validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server.

trans-unit.source: Do not validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server. This is only needed if a server uses self-signed certificates.
trans-unit.target: Do not validate certificates from the TLS/SSL server. This is only needed if a server uses self-signed certificates.

trans-unit.source: Force use of start-TLS to encrypt the session, and reject connection to servers that do not support it.
trans-unit.target: Force use of start-TLS to encrypt the session, and reject connection to servers that do not support it.

trans-unit.source: Do not use start-TLS to encrypt the session, even with servers that support it.
trans-unit.target: Do not use start-TLS to encrypt the session, even with servers that support it.

trans-unit.source: This is the main image for your category, displayed in the category page. The category description will overlap this image and appear in its top-left corner.
trans-unit.target: This is the main image for your category, displayed in the category page. The category description will overlap this image and appear in its top-left corner.

trans-unit.source: To add "tags," click in the field, write something, and then press "Enter."
trans-unit.target: To add "tags," click in the field, write something, and then press "Enter."

trans-unit.source: Only letters, numbers, underscore (_) and the minus (-) character are allowed.
trans-unit.target: Only letters, numbers, underscore (_) and the minus (-) character are allowed.

trans-unit.source: You now have three default customer groups.
trans-unit.target: You now have three default customer groups.

trans-unit.source: Mark all of the customer groups which you would like to have access to this category.
trans-unit.target: Mark all of the customer groups which you would like to have access to this category.

trans-unit.source: Number of days this file can be accessed by customers. Set to zero for unlimited access.
trans-unit.target: Number of days this file can be accessed by customers. Set to zero for unlimited access.

trans-unit.source: This is the retail price at which you intend to sell this product to your customers. The tax included price will change according to the tax rule you select.
trans-unit.target: This is the net sales price for your customers. The retail price will automatically be calculated using the applied tax rate.

trans-unit.source: The full filename with its extension (e.g. Book.pdf)
trans-unit.target: The full filename with its extension (e.g. Book.pdf)

trans-unit.source: Number of downloads allowed per customer. Set to 0 for unlimited downloads.
trans-unit.target: Number of downloads allowed per customer. Set to 0 for unlimited downloads.

trans-unit.source: If set, the file will not be downloadable after this date. Leave blank if you do not wish to attach an expiration date.
trans-unit.target: If set, the file will not be downloadable after this date. Leave blank if you do not wish to attach an expiration date.

trans-unit.source: This is the price at which you intend to sell this product to your customers. The tax included price will change according to the tax rule you select.
trans-unit.target: This is the net sales price for your customers. The retail price will automatically be calculated using the applied tax rate.

trans-unit.source: Some products can be purchased by unit (per bottle, per pound, etc.), and this is the price for one unit. For instance, if you’re selling fabrics, it would be the price per meter.
trans-unit.target: If your country's pricing laws or regulations require mandatory informations about the base price of a unit, fill in the base price here (for example, price per kg, per liter, per meter).

trans-unit.source: The cost price is the price you paid for the product. Do not include the tax. It should be lower than the retail price: the difference between the two will be your margin.
trans-unit.target: The cost price is the price you paid for the product. Do not include the tax. It should be lower than the net sales price: the difference between the two will be your margin.

trans-unit.source: Tags are meant to help your customers find your products via the search bar.
trans-unit.target: Tags facilitate the product search for customers using the search bar.

trans-unit.source: Choose terms and keywords that your customers will use to search for this product and make sure you are consistent with the tags you may have already used.
trans-unit.target: Choose terms and keywords which your potential customers commonly would search for when looking for this product. Make sure that they are consistent with the tags you may have already defined.

trans-unit.source: You can manage tag aliases in the [1]Search section[/1]. If you add new tags, you have to rebuild the index.
trans-unit.target: You can manage tag aliases in the [1]Search section[/1]. If you add new tags, you have to rebuild the index.

trans-unit.source: ISBN is used internationally to identify books and their various editions.
trans-unit.target: The International Standard Book Number (ISBN) is used to identify books and other publications.

trans-unit.source: This type of product code is widely used in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand and in other countries.
trans-unit.target: This type of product code is widely used in the United States, Canada, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand and in other countries.

trans-unit.source: Invalid token
trans-unit.target: Invalid token

trans-unit.source: Yes, I understand the risks
trans-unit.target: I understand the risk

trans-unit.source: This type of product code is specific to Europe and Japan, but is widely used internationally. It is a superset of the UPC code: all products marked with an EAN will be accepted in North America.
trans-unit.target: This type of product code is specific to Europe and Japan, but is widely used internationally. It is a superset of the UPC code: all products marked with an EAN will be accepted in North America.

trans-unit.source: This interface allows you to specify the warehouse in which the product is stocked.
trans-unit.target: This interface allows you to specify the warehouse in which the product is stocked.

trans-unit.source: Combinations are the different variations of a product, with attributes like its size, weight or color taking different values. To create a combination, you need to create your product attributes first. Go to Catalog > Attributes & Features for this!
trans-unit.target: Combinations are the different variations of a product, with attributes like its size, weight or color taking different values. To create a combination, you need to create your product attributes first. Go to Catalog > Attributes & Features for this!

trans-unit.source:
To add combinations, you first need to create proper attributes and values in [1]Attributes & Features[/1].
When done, you may enter the wanted attributes (like "size" or "color") and their respective values ("XS", "red", "all", etc.) in the field below; or simply select them from the right column. Then click on "Generate": it will automatically create all the combinations for you!
trans-unit.target:
To add combinations, you first need to create proper attributes and values in [1]Attributes & Features[/1].
When done, you may enter the wanted attributes (like "size" or "color") and their respective values ("XS", "red", "all", etc.) in the field below; or simply select them from the right column. Then click on "Generate": it will automatically create all the combinations for you!

trans-unit.source: If a carrier has a tax, it will be added to the shipping fees.
trans-unit.target: If a carrier has a tax, it will be added to the shipping fees.

trans-unit.source: If you want to quickly create a new category, you can do it here. Don’t forget to then go to the Categories page to fill in the needed details (description, image, etc.). A new category will not automatically appear in your shop's menu, please read the Help about it.
trans-unit.target: If you want to quickly create a new category, you can do it here. Don’t forget to then go to the Categories page to fill in the needed details (description, image, etc.). A new category will not automatically appear in your shop's menu, please read the Help about it.

trans-unit.source: This is the human-readable URL, as generated from the product's name. You can change it if you want.
trans-unit.target: This is the human-readable URL, as generated from the product's name. You can change it if you want.

trans-unit.source: When your product is disabled, choose to which page you’d like to redirect the customers visiting its page by typing the product or category name.
trans-unit.target: When your product is disabled, choose to which page you’d like to redirect the customers visiting its page by typing the product or category name.

trans-unit.source: Recommended dimensions (for the default theme): %1spx x %2spx
trans-unit.target: Recommended dimensions (for the default theme): %1spx x %2spx

trans-unit.source: An empty category is a category that has no product directly associated to it. An empty category may however contain products through its subcategories.
trans-unit.target: An empty category is a category that has no product directly associated to it. An empty category may however contain products through its subcategories.

trans-unit.source: This will be displayed in the cart summary, as well as on the invoice.
trans-unit.target: This will be displayed in the cart summary, as well as on the invoice.

trans-unit.source: For your eyes only. This will never be displayed to the customer.
trans-unit.target: For your eyes only. This will never be displayed to the customer.

trans-unit.source: This is the code users should enter to apply the voucher to a cart. Either create your own code or generate one by clicking on "Generate".
trans-unit.target: This is the code users should enter to apply the voucher to a cart. Either create your own code or generate one by clicking on "Generate".

trans-unit.source: Caution! If you leave this field blank, the rule will automatically be applied to benefiting customers.
trans-unit.target: Caution! If you leave this field blank, the rule will automatically be applied to benefiting customers.

trans-unit.source: If the voucher is not yet in the cart, it will be displayed in the cart summary.
trans-unit.target: If the voucher is not yet in the cart, it will be displayed in the cart summary.

trans-unit.source: Only applicable if the voucher value is greater than the cart total.
trans-unit.target: Only applicable if the voucher value is greater than the cart total.

trans-unit.source: If you do not allow partial use, the voucher value will be lowered to the total order amount. If you allow partial use, however, a new voucher will be created with the remainder.
trans-unit.target: If you do not allow partial use, the voucher value will be lowered to the total order amount. If you allow partial use, however, a new voucher will be created with the remainder.

trans-unit.source: Cart rules are applied by priority. A cart rule with a priority of "1" will be processed before a cart rule with a priority of "2".
trans-unit.target: Cart rules are applied by priority. A cart rule with a priority of "1" will be processed before a cart rule with a priority of "2".

trans-unit.source: Optional: The cart rule will be available to everyone if you leave this field blank.
trans-unit.target: Optional: The cart rule will be available to everyone if you leave this field blank.

trans-unit.source: The default period is one month.
trans-unit.target: The default period is one month.

trans-unit.source: You can choose a minimum amount for the cart either with or without the taxes and shipping.
trans-unit.target: You can choose a minimum amount for the cart either with or without the taxes and shipping.

trans-unit.source: The cart rule will be applied to the first "X" customers only.
trans-unit.target: The cart rule will be applied to the first "X" customers only.

trans-unit.source: A customer will only be able to use the cart rule "X" time(s).
trans-unit.target: A customer will only be able to use the cart rule "X" time(s).

trans-unit.source: This restriction applies to the country of delivery.
trans-unit.target: This restriction applies to the country of delivery.

trans-unit.source: Does not apply to the shipping costs
trans-unit.target: Does not apply to the shipping costs
